title: Kim Kardashian says Prince Harry and Duchess Meghan are 'changing the world'
text:
Kim Kardashian says Prince Harry and Duchess Meghan are 'changing the world'

Cape Town – While in Armenia this week, Kim Kardashian West got candid about the Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

The reality star was asked about her thoughts on the royal couple and praised them for the important work they’re doing.

While she said nobody’s perfect – "They’re not. I’m not. I don’t know who is." – she continued, "I still love and value the fact they bring such attention to such important movements that need to happen and things that they’re really passionate about."

"They’re still changing the world," she said.

The Duke and Duchess of Sussex recently wrapped up their royal tour of Africa, shedding light on gender based violence and empowering the youth, among other causes close to their hearts. They shifted their focus to mental health this week, with World Mental Health Day falling on 10 October.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been busy championing causes she's passionate about too though.

While studying to get her law degree, she’s continued to advocate for justice reform in the US – even meeting with President Donald Trump.

According to TIME, Momolu Stewart, who was tried as an adult for murder at the age of 16, and spent more than 20 years in prison because of it, was released from the DC Central Detention Facility on Monday.

Kim Kardashian met with the now free man in prison in July to hear his story, after which she wrote a letter to the judge advocating for his release.
description: Kim Kardashian praised the royal couple for the important work they’re doing by championing "important movements".
